description: Gothic crown of twisted black metal set with blood-red gemstones

core:description.text: A crown befitting dark royalty, forged from twisted black metal that rises in sharp angular points around the wearer's head. Blood-red gemstones are set throughout the twisted metalwork, their deep crimson hues gleaming like captured droplets of life. The jagged design creates an imposing silhouette that draws eyes upward, while the rough texture of the metal contrasts beautifully with the polished stones. This regal piece transforms its wearer into a figure of gothic majesty, commanding respect and awe in equal measure.
